welcome_message: Hello, it's your ChatGPT bot. Ask me anything you want. Type /clear to clear you context an start new conversation.
clear_message: Your context was cleared, you can start new conversation.
send_system_message: Please send the text that ChatGPT will use as a guide for behavior. Note that this will clear your context.
system_message_applied: Your context message was successfully applied. Now you can start the conversation with ChatGPT.
system_message_cancel: Ok, initial context message will not be changed.
context_length_exceeded_error: Unfortunately, you reached the maximum conversation length, please start new using /clear command.
other_error: Unfortunately, an error occurred, please try again later.
